root.name: Rugby 08
root.description: EA's Rugby 08 was the last official rugby game released by EA. TeamsThe game featured a large selection of teams including the team's license, however many teams in the game did not include a license.International TeamsEnglandTongaSamoaUnited StatesAustraliaCanadaJapanWalesFijiNew ZealandPortugalRomaniaScotlandItalyFranceArgentinaIrelandGeorgiaNamibiaUruguaySpainRussiaSouth AfricaSuper 14BullsSharksStormersLionsCheetahsWaratahsRedsBrumbiesWestern ForceCrusadersBluesChiefsHurricanesHighlanders European ClubsEngland:SaracensLondon WaspsLondon IrishNorthampton SaintsSale SharksWorcester WarriorsBathHarlequinsGloucesterNewcastle FalconsBristolLeicester TigersFranceBiarritz OlympiqueParisUSA PerpignanCastres OlympiqueToulouseCiermont AuvergneBourgoinItalyCalvisano BresciaTrevisoMagners LeagueCardiffNewportLlanelliNeath-SwanseaUlsterMunsterLeinsterEdinburghGlasgow WarriorsOthersJunior New Zealand All BlacksAustralia A-TeamBarbariansPacific Islanders
